CustomField.formula: IF(BillingStreet <> '' || BillingCity <> '' || BillingState <> '' || BillingPostalCode <> '' || BillingCountry <> '' , IF( Alternative_Invoice_Company_Name__c <> '', Alternative_Invoice_Company_Name__c & BR() , '') & IF(BillingStreet <> '', BillingStreet & BR() , '') & IF(BillingCity<> '', BillingCity & BR() , '') & IF(BillingState <> '', BillingState& BR() , '') & IF(BillingPostalCode<> '', BillingPostalCode & BR() , '') & IF(BillingCountry <> '', BillingCountry & BR() , ''), '')
CustomField.label: Bill To
